plugins.name: ABAP
plugins.description: Enable analysis and reporting on ABAP projects

release.description: 14 new rules, most of them designed to detect potential performance hotspots.

plugins.name: Analysis Bootstrapper for Visual Studio Projects
plugins.description: Bootstraps the analysis from Visual Studio solution and project files.

plugins.name: Android
plugins.organizationName: SonarSource and Jerome Van Der Linden, Stephane Nicolas, Florian Roncari, Thomas Bores

release.description: This plugin has been renamed "Android Lint" to prevent any misunderstanding about its purpose: an Android project can be analysed with the standard SonarQube Java plugin and this plugin just allows to import Android Lint reports if needed. This new version provides a default sqale mapping for the Android Lint rules and the ability to automatically execute lint has been dropped.
